usa: The Tillman Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-28" class="reference">[28]</sup>
The Gentlemen's Agreement of 1907 was signed.<sup id="cite_ref-29" class="reference">[29]</sup>
Oklahoma was admitted to the Union, becoming the 46th state.<sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference">[30]</sup>
Monongah Mining Disaster: A coal mine exploded in Monongah, West Virginia, killing at least 361.[31]
